summary: adds thoridal the stars fury to the game
descriptionHtml:
standalone craftable new bow

Bug:
the only bug so far is that the mesh also, retextures the daedric bow


installation:
put Thori\'Dal, Stars Fury.esp under the data folder
the daedricbowskinned.nif goes under: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\daedric
drop the unreal folder under C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures



all credits go to blizzard entertainment for creating this weapon and world of warcraft
author: DOALVOLURN
